get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of categories with optional sorting and pagination.

parameters.name: column
parameters.description: Column to sort by (name, created_at, updated_at)

400.description: Invalid sort column or direction. Allowed columns: name, created_at, updated_at. Allowed directions: asc, desc.

message.example: Invalid sort column or direction. Allowed columns: name, created_at, updated_at. Allowed directions: asc, desc.

post.description: Creates a new category with an optional image upload.

get.description: Returns a category with a paginated list of stores for that category.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Column to sort by (name, address, created_at, updated_at)

post.description: Update a category's name and optional image. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to update

image.description: Optional image file for the category

403.description: Unauthorized to update - category has associated stores

message.example: You are not authorized to update this Category. It has associated Stores.

delete.description: Delete a category by its ID. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to delete

403.description: Unauthorized to delete - category has associated stores

message.example: You are not authorized to delete this Category. It has associated Stores.

get.summary: Retrieve all stores with pagination and sorting

parameters.name: column
parameters.description: Column to sort by (name, address, created_at, updated_at)

400.description: Invalid sort column or direction. Allowed columns: name, address, created_at, updated_at. Allowed directions: asc, desc.

message.example: Invalid sort column or direction. Allowed columns: name, address, created_at, updated_at. Allowed directions: asc, desc.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific store by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the store to retrieve

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the store to be updated

403.description: You are not authorized to update this Store

message.example: You are not authorized to update this Store.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the store to be deleted

403.description: You are not authorized to delete this Store

message.example: You are not authorized to delete this Store.

bearerAuth.name: Authorization
